mapper.select: select a.eno ,b.hireDate ,b.ppscode ,a.totalvac ,a.usevac ,a.remainvac ,a.genervac from vacation a, employee b where a.eno = b.eno and a.eno = #{eno}

select hiredate startdate , last_day(add_months(trunc(hiredate, 'y'), 11)) enddate from employee where eno = #{eno} union select trunc(add_months(hiredate,12*addyear), 'y') startdate , last_day(add_months(trunc(add_months(hiredate,12*addyear), 'y'), 11)) enddate from employee , (SELECT LEVEL AS addyear FROM DUAL, (select to_number(to_char(sysdate,'yy')) - to_number(to_char(hiredate,'yy')) as levels from employee where eno = #{eno}) CONNECT BY LEVEL <=levels) where eno = #{eno} and trunc(add_months(hiredate,12*addyear), 'y') < trunc(add_months(sysdate,12), 'y') order by startdate desc

select eno ,vacstart ,vacend ,vacday ,vaccontent ,remday from vaclog where vacstart between to_date(#{vyear}||'0101', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{vyear}||'1231', 'YYYY-MM-DD') and eno = #{eno} order by vacstart desc

select regdate ,proday ,procontent ,enddate ,eno from vacproduce where regdate between to_date(#{vyear}||'0101', 'yyyy/mm/dd') and to_date(#{vyear}||'1231', 'yyyy/mm/dd') and eno = #{eno} order by regdate desc
